conversion_verification.notes: Excellent isometric-style cutaway with clear geometric depth and volume.

3d_conversion_fundamentals.notes: Walls have consistent thickness/height; perfect isometric projection and clean cutaway execution.

geometric_accuracy.notes: Extremely high fidelity. Room adjacencies, kitchen island placement, and stair location are exactly as according to the 2D plan.

interior_elements.notes: All furniture including the bed, dining set, sofa, kitchen stove, and even bathroom fixtures are present and correctly placed.

visual_clarity.notes: Clean lighting and consistent materials. Minor point deduction for slightly simplified window frame geometry on the bottom edge.

detected_errors.description: The balcony folding doors are rendered as standard windows/panels rather than the specific folding geometry shown in the 2D plan.

summary: A highly accurate and clean 3D conversion that maintains almost perfect geometric and spatial fidelity to the original floor plan.
